excerpt: The TMC457-EVAL is designed to evaluate the TMC457-BC high-end motion controller in combination with an ARM7 processor and a TMC246B-PA stepper motor driver or with a Piezo LEGS™ piezo motor from PiezoMotor™. All you need to get started is a power supply and Trinamic's free and easy to use TMCL-IDE. This graphical user interface allows quick setup and supports the use of commands in direct mode, monitors real-time behavior visualized in graphs, and logs and stores data.
